supporting_spans: M. Noirtier, stretching himself out at his ease in the chair, said, "Really, pray tell me all about it, for it must be interesting."
contradicting_spans: M. Noirtier was found the next day in the Seine.
reasoning: Contradiction (factual): The evidence directly contradicts the claim that M. Noirtier joined a radical republican cell and spoke in cafés and back-room meetings for the revolutionary cause.

analysis.claim_text: At eighteen he joined a radical republican cell, speaking in cafés and back-room meetings for the revolutionary cause.
